html: Voice actors — perform these lines as this character on a leaf: "If I stay here, the world might pass me by. I may one day look back and wonder Was it worth it to stay dry?" Add your performance here: http://bit.ly/2wp1o5H pic.twitter.com/kFxF4mIa22
text:
Voice actors — perform these lines as this character on a leaf:

"If I stay here, the world might pass me by.
I may one day look back and wonder
Was it worth it to stay dry?"

Add your performance here: http://bit.ly/2wp1o5H pic.twitter.com/kFxF4mIa22
